name: Add supabase authentication to web app
shortDesc: Add google, apple, & facebook authentication to the app using supabase auth.
longDesc: Set up google, apple, & facebook OAuth providers for the web app to allow users to log in using those options instead of email.

name: Entire Cottage App
longDesc: Create the entire cottage app. It must be fully featured with user authentication, machine learning block-chain technology, react hooks, serverless functions, & automated NFT production for each user. I also need you to host it for me for free & it needs to be completed by next Friday. $200 HARD LIMIT. Programming is easy.

name: Remove extra API call
shortDesc: Remove the extra call to Auth0 when a user logs in
longDesc: There is an extra call being made to Auth0

name: Create Abandon Task API
shortDesc: Create an api that changes the status of task from in_progress to in_queue.
longDesc: Create the API that gets called when a user completes the abandon task from in the 'currentTask' component. This api should include a check to see if the logged in user is the current user of the task. If that is true then update status of the task from 'in_progress' to 'in_queue'

name: Create More Details Popup For Task in Review
shortDesc: Create a popup that shows more details of the task currently in review.
longDesc: This should include the client name, task description, and duration since submit.

name: Create a unique avatar based on username.
shortDesc: If user doesn't have a image based avatar then dynamically create a unique image per user.
longDesc: When user logs in check to see if they have a imageUrl in the user row. If they do not then create a unique image based on their username so it is consistent whenever it loads. Apply this image to the user profile picture.

name: Create a request help form.
shortDesc: When a user is stuck on a task, allow them to request help from the community.
longDesc: This button is in the current task more actions popup. When the button is pressed popup a form for the user to fill out that will then be sent to the forum to request help from the community. This should include, the task description, the users goal, the current state, what they have attempted, the error arising, & the code in question.

name: Create a 'request a demo' popup.
shortDesc: Create a popup in the bottom right corner that allows visitors to request a demo.
longDesc: When a visitor lands on the site wait a few seconds & then fadein a popup that allows them to schedule a demo with the ceo.

name: Add a background image to the hero section of homepage
shortDesc: Add a responsive image to the background of the hero section with text overlay.
longDesc: The image should be of a piggybank & a person.

name: Test Task
shortDesc: lorem and other stuff too. This needs to be somewhat long but not a crazy amount.
